query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS materialCollections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  color VARCHAR(50),
  icon VARCHAR(50),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX materialCollection_user_idx (userId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS collectionMaterials (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  collectionId INT NOT NULL,
  materialId INT NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  addedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (collectionId) REFERENCES materialCollections(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (materialId) REFERENCES libraryMaterials(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX collectionMaterial_collection_idx (collectionId),
  INDEX collectionMaterial_material_idx (materialId),
  UNIQUE INDEX unique_collection_material (collectionId, materialId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS favoriteMaterials (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  materialId INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (materialId) REFERENCES libraryMaterials(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX favoriteMaterial_user_idx (userId),
  INDEX favoriteMaterial_material_idx (materialId),
  UNIQUE INDEX unique_user_material (userId, materialId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS favoriteMaterials (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
